Hit Points.Hit Points at Higher Levels: 1d8 (or 5) + your Constitution modifier per monk level after 1st

Proficiencies.Tools: Choose one type of artisan's tools or one musical instrument
Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, and Stealth

Equipment: a shortsword or any simple weapon
a dungeoneer's pack or an explorer's pack

Class Features.name: Unarmored Defense
Class Features.desc: While you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

Class Features.name: Martial Arts
Class Features.desc: You can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of your unarmed strikes and monk weapons. You can roll a d4 in place of the normal damage of your unarmed strike or monk weapon. When you use the Attack action with an unarmed strike or a monk weapon, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action.

Class Features.name: Ki
Class Features.desc: You can use ki points to fuel various features such as Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, and Step of the Wind.

Class Features.name: Unarmored Movement
Class Features.desc: Your speed increases by 10 feet while you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield. This bonus increases as you gain levels.

Class Features.name: Dedicated Weapon (Optional)
Class Features.desc: You can count a chosen weapon as a monk weapon until you use this feature again.

Class Features.name: Monastic Tradition
Class Features.desc: At 3rd level, you commit to a monastic tradition that grants you additional features at 6th, 11th, and 17th levels.

Class Features.name: Deflect Missiles
Class Features.desc: You can use your reaction to deflect or catch a missile when hit by a ranged weapon attack.

Class Features.name: Ki-Fueled Attack (Optional)
Class Features.desc: If you spend 1 ki point or more as part of your action, you can make one attack with an unarmed strike or a monk weapon as a bonus action before the end of the turn.

Class Features.name: Ability Score Improvement
Class Features.desc: At 4th, 8th, 12th, 16th, and 19th levels, you can increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

Class Features.name: Slow Fall
Class Features.desc: You can reduce falling damage by an amount equal to five times your monk level.

Class Features.name: Quickened Healing (Optional)
Class Features.desc: You can spend 2 ki points and roll a Martial Arts die to regain hit points equal to the roll plus your proficiency bonus.

Class Features.name: Extra Attack
Class Features.desc: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

Class Features.name: Stunning Strike
Class Features.desc: You can spend 1 ki point to attempt a stunning strike when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack.

Class Features.name: Focused Aim (Optional)
Class Features.desc: When you miss with an attack roll, you can spend 1 to 3 ki points to increase your attack roll by 2 for each ki point spent.

Class Features.name: Ki-Empowered Strikes
Class Features.desc: Your unarmed strikes count as magical for overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

Class Features.name: Evasion
Class Features.desc: You take no damage on a successful Dexterity saving throw against effects that allow a save for half damage, and only half damage if you fail.

Class Features.name: Stillness of Mind
Class Features.desc: You can use your action to end one effect on yourself that is causing you to be charmed or frightened.

Class Features.name: Purity of Body
Class Features.desc: You are immune to disease and poison.

Class Features.name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
Class Features.desc: You understand all spoken languages and any creature that can understand a language can understand you.

Class Features.name: Diamond Soul
Class Features.desc: You gain proficiency in all saving throws and can spend 1 ki point to reroll a saving throw.

Class Features.name: Timeless Body
Class Features.desc: You suffer none of the frailty of old age and no longer need food or water.

Class Features.name: Empty Body
Class Features.desc: You can become invisible for 1 minute and gain resistance to all damage except force damage by spending 4 ki points. You can also cast the astral projection spell by spending 8 ki points.

Class Features.name: Perfect Self
Class Features.desc: When you roll for initiative and have no ki points remaining, you regain 4 ki points.
